price: Hao ndio walio nunua upotofu kwa uwongofu; lakini biashara yao haikupata tija, wala hawakuwa wenye kuongoka.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَٰرَتُهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُهۡتَدِينَ
footnotes: Na hawa (wanaafiki) kwa kukhiari upotofu badala ya uwongofu wamekuwa kama mfanya biashara aliye khiari kwa biashara yake bidhaa mbovu ya kuchina, basi hafanikiwi kupata faida yoyote. Hupoteza rasilmali yake. Na wao basi hawaongokewi katika 'amali yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ish'tarawū al-ḍalālata bil-hudā famā rabiḥat tijāratuhum wamā kānū muh'tadīna
